attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having read the response from the prime ministers office stating that 94% of estates are not affected is pure lies.The simple fact is that you are taxing on property that has already been paid for and taxed, i.e stealing money you have no right to.Raise the money another way.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
